page: AG41004: Manufacture And Testing Of Agricultural Machinery

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Foundry Practices: Principles of casting and forming. Heat treatment, annealing. Fabrication and Manufacture: Welding, soldering and brazing. Nontraditional methods of machining. Tooling, Jigs and Fixtures: Principles of planning and tool design. Control of machine tools. Jigs and fixtures. Robotics: Robot technology. Robot applications in manufacturing. Manufacturing Systems: Standardization. Manufacturing of production models of farm machines. Computer integrated manufacturing systems with applications to agricultural equipment. Testing: Testing of field machines. Standards.
page: AG41004: Manufacture And Testing Of Agricultural Machinery
